talent_flow_core:
One place
for freelancers and those
looking to implement their services

page1.title: Work your way
page1.description: Whether you're a designer, developer, writer, or in any other field, find projects that match your skills and work on them comfortably.

page2.title: Meet the best freelancers
page2.description: Need design, development, writing, or any other service? You'll find freelancers ready to execute your project with professionalism.

page3.title: Everything in one place
page3.description: From sending proposals, to project management, to secure payment – every step of the way between you and the other party is seamless and secure.

login.title: Login
login.password_error_short: Password must be at least 6 characters

send_verification.title: Send Account Verification Instructions
send_verification.error_invalid_phone: Please enter a valid phone number

project_card.description: The project is a football application (NATIVE ANDROID & iOS) connected to a LARAVEL BACKEND. Required: SENIOR LEVEL developer to modify notification system after Firebase changes...

add_project.project_title_hint: e.g., Logo design for a tech company
add_project.title_helper: Enter a brief title that accurately describes your project.
add_project.description_helper: Provide a detailed description of your project and attach examples if possible.
add_project.budget_helper: Choose a suitable budget to receive good offers.
add_project.upload_helper: Add an attractive image that represents the work.
add_project.questions_helper: Add the questions you want freelancers to answer when submitting offers.

project_description.title: Project Details
project_description.paragraph_part1: Before you send an important offer, the theme is implemented on the Salla Partners platform. They have a system where you go to their site here
project_description.paragraph_part2:
and a theme is created and linked to GitHub. A default theme file is downloaded, and the required theme is built upon it, which I believe involves modifications.
 Anyone who is unfamiliar should create an account and check the situation before sending an offer with the required theme details.
 I have also attached images for some ideas.

terms_screen.section1_point1: Users must be over 18 years old.
terms_screen.section1_point2: Accurate and complete information must be provided when creating an account.
terms_screen.section1_point3: Owning more than one account is not permitted without administrative approval.
terms_screen.section2_point1: Talent Flow is an intermediary between project owners and freelancers and does not guarantee project success or work quality, but provides tools to manage the relationship between both parties.
terms_screen.section2_point2: Each party is responsible for verifying the other party before starting.
terms_screen.section3_point1: The project value is agreed upon between the freelancer and the employer.
terms_screen.section3_point2: The platform deducts a commission (%) determined by the administration, for example 10%, from each successful transaction.
terms_screen.section4_point1: Publishing content that is illegal or offensive is prohibited.
terms_screen.section4_point2: Communicating outside the platform regarding projects with the aim of evading commission is prohibited.

about_talent_flow.title: What is Talent Flow
about_talent_flow.question: What is Talent Flow?
about_talent_flow.paragraph1_part2: is a freelancing platform that connects project owners with professional freelancers in fields like design, development, marketing, and content writing.
about_talent_flow.paragraph2: Talent Flow aims to simplify temporary or part-time hiring by providing a safe space to manage projects, enable communication between parties, and ensure secure payments for high-quality work.

add_projects.title: Add Your Portfolio
add_projects.description: Add your top 3 recent works that show your expertise in your field. The Talent Flow team will review your work before approving your join request.
add_projects.rule1: Add works you created yourself and not copied.
add_projects.rule2: Make sure the works are unique and of high quality.
add_projects.rule3: Write a clear title and an accurate description highlighting the features of the work.
add_projects.rule4: Do not submit empty or duplicate works.

term_one: All works are my own and I have the rights to publish them.
term_two: I understand my account will be suspended if I use copyrighted works.
upload_here: Click here to upload or drag & drop
work_description_hint: Write a description for the work...
work_features_hint: Add detailed features of the work
